name: electricity production, natural gas, aluminium industry | electricity, high voltage, aluminium industry | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/11735/documentation

This is a dataset used to create an aluminium industry specific electricity market for 'aluminium production Area 3' (South America). IThe production volume represents the total amount of electricity from natural gas used in the region for aluminium production (electrolysis and ingot casting).  The dataset also identifies the countries providing the electricity from natural gas fired power plants. ;Electricity markets specific to the aluminium-industry are needed in an LCI database because primary aluminium production is very energy intensive, and hence the location of production plants is often determined by access to large amounts of cheap electricity, which often results in an electricity mix that is different from the general grid mix of the countries where the production plants are located. ;It is assumed that the production of electricity in general and in aluminium industry specific power plants is identical. Details on actual electricity generation with each technology can be found in the corresponding datasets.;Calculations are detailed in the report 'Calculating grid mixes for the aluminium industry in ecoinvent v3', available on the ecoinvent website.

Re-labelling dataset, not representing a real transformation activity. Conceptually, the activity can be said to start with the production of electricity.

Re-labelling dataset, not representing a real transformation activity. Conceptually, the activity can be said to end with a given amount of high voltage electricity labelled as specifically used for the production of electricity.
category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/351:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution/3510:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Production volume updated with 2015 data from IAI
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Aluminium producing South American countries (AR, BR, VE)
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Although there are different types of natural gas power plants, all electricity generation modelled using 'electricity production, natural gas, at conventional power plant'.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: IAI data used for total electricity used in the production of aluminium that is from natural gas power plants. Data based on 100% of regional aluminium production.

exchanges.description: Expressed as sum of contributing technologies (inputs) to allow uncertainty analysis: each technology share is uncertain, and in a Monte Carlo analysis will always be normalized by the sum contribution of each technology

flow.name: electricity, high voltage, aluminium industry
flow.category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/351:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution/3510:Electric power generation, transmission and distribution

exchanges.description: Calculated amount (see general comments). 0.34 kWh are supplied from Brazil. This amount is split over electricity production from natural gas in the different Brazilian grids according to their annual production volumes. 12.67% of electricity produced in conventional natural gas plants in Brazil, is produced in the Mid-western area and 58.79 % from south-eastern area
